title: C# Level 2 â€” Data Types, Variables & Operators
intro: This level focuses on built-in data types, variable declarations, and basic operators in C#.
points: Declare variables of types int, double, char, bool, and string.
Understand value types vs reference types at a basic level.
Use arithmetic operators (+, -, *, /, %) and assignment operators.
Use relational and logical operators in conditions.
Get a feeling for implicit and explicit casting between numeric types.
